main event: An unidentified object described as aircraft shaped and pinkish in color was observed for 5-10 minutes in Belmont, California.
interesting points: The object was at an approximate altitude of 5000 feet., The sighting occurred at dusk, which may explain the pinkish color., Witnesses reported the object appearing aircraft shaped., The conclusion indicated very little information, but the object was probably aircraft., Six people called the Belmont police about the sighting.
witness description: six people reported the sighting to the police
